component.name: GCstar
component.summary: Collection manager for Linux, Windows and MacOS written in Perl and based on Gtk.

description.p: GCstar is a collection manager available on Linux, Windows and MacOS. It natively supports common types of collections (books, videos, comics, music, TV series, video games, board games, toys, miniature vehicules, stamps, coins, gadgetsâ€¦) and can be customized to support new ones.
